infos.value: Please, we need your help!
You... You're from Yezagh, right?
We may be the lower caste of our society...
But we're still above you bottom-caste beasts!
We have dignity and rights as the humans that we are.
But you? You're just cattle. Animals hiding beneath human skin!
You're wrong!
What rights place you above the people of Yezagh? ...Since when!?
Since a time long before you were even branded.
Tch... They've caught up to us.
Heh, you didn't think I would let you get away, did you?
I'd say this is a good time for everyone to calm down.
Who're you?
The name's Galzahk.
The headman of the Arms Dealers' Guild? That Galzahk?
These two are from Yezagh, huh? Splendid! I think they might do well for themselves in my guild.
Uh...
Hold your tongue!
These two are important possessions of His Fierceness, King Muraga.
Oh, is that so?
Strange, you seem to be treating them rather disdainfully...
G-grrr...
Why don't we engage in the ancient art of striking a deal?
What kind of deal...?
I'll buy these two from you.
I think not.
Well, then... I guess I'm going to have a tough time keeping my mouth shut.
...A-about what?
About why Fennes is cracking the whip on their ore mining. War is brewing...isn't it?
There's one more thing. A curious rumor that fell into my lap.
Talk of a girl from these parts who's to be wed to a certain prince.
Now, if only there were a country willing to buy these little tidbits off me for a nice, high price...
Do so and you'll incur a wrath greater than you can imagine...
Hence my desire...for that deal I mentioned.
...What guarantee do I have that you'll maintain your silence?
Trust, you see, is the number one commodity of an arms dealer.
We lose it, and business all but dries up.
...Fine.
Stop.
...Got something to say?
Who says you get to decide our fate?
Good gods... We'd all but come to an agreement here.
You need to get your scruffy head around your position in the scheme of things.
Either spend your life here toiling like a beast of burden, or come work for me in the Arms Dealers' Guild.
You don't have any other options... Got it?
Don't speak to me as if you're high and mighty.
You're no different. Your eyes are on Velne, aren't they?
You speak of the girl... Indeed, I suppose she is the greater catch.
Her beauty will be her weapon. I imagine she'll make quite the popular arms dealer.
I knew it. You're just like the rest of these snakes...
And yet I still see no other options for you...
Oh, but there is. This!
For crying out loud...
Insolent fools! Don't go thinking you can escape us!
Hmph... This is turning into a mess...
And here I was providing the perfect opportunity to rid themselves of these mines...
